articles.author: Brian Stelter, CNN Business
articles.title: CNN fires Chris Cuomo - CNN
articles.description: CNN said Saturday that anchor Chris Cuomo has been "terminated" by the network, "effective immediately." The announcement came after an outside law firm was retained to review exactly how Cuomo aided his brother, former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo.
